* * *

View full gallery

* * *

## About The Thirsty Goose Mobile Bar

### The Thirsty Goose Mobile Bar

Mobile Bar serving NEO

Get a quote

We are a mobile bar service for hire in Northeast Ohio and beyond. The bar is
one of the biggest aspects of your wedding, get guests really excited and
leaves them talking long after your special day. We understand this and strive
to make the bar a fun, attractive beacon for guests, providing excellent bar
service alongside seasonal and tasty cocktails. Our multiple rentals will fit
in with any decor or theme. As part of our service, we take care of bringing
all bar essentials as well as helping plan your menu, figure amounts, place an
alcohol order & deliver the day of your wedding. You worry about nothing,
except which rental to choose!

We are hard-working, fun-loving, and like to throw a good party! Heather has
worked in the bar & hospitality world for over 20 years and has a love for
great-tasting adult beverages. Rob has been a diesel mechanic for over a
decade and is one handy craftsman. Together we make a great team and are so
excited to combine our talents to help make your event unique, memorable, and
special!

* * *

## Services

### Services

  * Bartenders
  * Cleanup and breakdown
  * Consultations and tastings - complimentary
  * Delivery and setup
  * Rental coordination - directly invoice couple

### Beverage services

  * Bartending
  * Mixers/non-alcoholic options
